body.p:
Harrodsburg Ky Apl 2nd 1861
Hon B Magoffin Esqr

Sir after reading the Letter on yesterday with Capt Alexanders Letter & Petition I Examined the papers & Execution & filed the amount of John D Alexanders fine is $30 & cost instead of 20 as stated in the Petition & Letter of Capt. A

Harrodsburg Po Ct
$30, } Breach
Jno. D Alexander
Remission Issd Apr 9. 1861
